ygData.subject: Re: Quill and Paper?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think they re in game, could be wrong. But the tome of ancient restoration (or something like that) was supposed to be able to restore faded scrolls,
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think they're in game, could be wrong. But the tome of ancient
restoration (or something like that) was supposed to be able to restore
faded scrolls, into spell scrolls.

>From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
>Ok now you have peeked my interest. What is a faded scroll?
>
>>I *heard* that they were used in researching "faded scrolls", but I don't
>>know =P
>>
>>Giltaagin
>>
>>
>>>>
>>>>Does anyone know why we need a quill and paper or do we even need them?
>>>> what are they for? i have found the book of binding for the necro but
>>>>what are the other books ie diabluque do they give spell ingredients?
>>>>
>>>At this point no one knows what they are for. I am at level 58 in making
>my
>>>own spells. I have made a bunch. Never used them!!! If you find out pleas
>>>tell me :)
>>>
>>
>>
